long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Import any image from Chrome to Figma without downloading it to computer.

How to setup:
1. Install and setup Figma plugin https://www.figma.com/community/plugin/1412019898398218197/chrome-to-figma
2. Install this Chrome extension
3. Copy Link ID to Chrome Extension

How It Works
When Chrome Extension and Figma plugin is running, use "Save Image As..." or website native download feature to transfer image to Figma file without downloading it to computer.
